hero.subtitle: NIS2, DORA, ISO 27001 Compliance - Protect your business with certified experts

service1.title: Regulatory Compliance
service1.description: Our tailored approach ensures your organization aligns with NIS2, MiCA, DORA, GDPR, VARA and DIFC requirements while ensuring business continuity.

service2.title: Cybersecurity Certifications
service2.description: Adopt the most demanding cybersecurity standards with our guidance on ISO frameworks (27001, 22301, 42001), SOC 2 or PCI-DSS.

service3.title: Part-time CISO
service3.description: Benefit from an experienced, certified and immediately operational Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) to support your organization.

service4.title: Training & Awareness
service4.description: Our custom programs combine practical training and regular awareness, perfectly adapted to your business challenges to strengthen your first line of defense.

section1.label: What is a cybersecurity company?
section1.title: Understanding the crucial role of cybersecurity companies
section1.description: A cybersecurity company, like Cyber-SSI, plays an essential role in protecting data and IT systems against digital threats. In a world where cyberattacks are increasingly sophisticated, these companies provide advanced security solutions to protect sensitive information for SMBs, startups, public administrations and institutions. Their importance lies in their ability to prevent data breaches, secure digital infrastructures and ensure business continuity.

section2.label: Why use a cybersecurity company?
section2.title: The benefits of working with cybersecurity experts
section2.description: Using a cybersecurity company is crucial for any organization looking to protect its digital assets. Cyber-SSI offers unmatched expertise in identifying vulnerabilities, implementing custom security solutions and ensuring compliance with international standards like ISO 27001. By working with us, businesses can reduce cyberattack risks, avoid financial losses and preserve their reputation.

caseStudies.sectionDescription: Discover how we have supported organizations of all sizes — from startups to institutions with 1,000+ employees — towards compliance and cybersecurity excellence.

andMore.title: ...and many more
andMore.description: We support organizations from 5 to over 2,000 employees, across all sectors.

case1.title: Intercommunal Syndicate & Local Authorities
case1.description: Cybersecurity support for 25 syndicates and 1,000+ local authorities: outsourced CISO, governance, ISO 27001 certification, HDS and NIS2 compliance, e-services accreditation.

case2.title: International Crypto Player
case2.description: Outsourced CISO for a crypto company operating in France, Switzerland and Italy. Cybersecurity strategy management, ISO 27001 certification, DORA compliance and MiCA license obtention.

case3.title: French Crypto Industry
case3.description: Outsourced CISO in charge of cybersecurity strategy: ISO 27001 compliance, DORA support, preparation and success of 2 PASSI audits, direct interactions with AMF.

case4.title: Departmental Council
case4.description: Outsourced CISO for a department: cybersecurity strategy management, IT team support, monthly cyber committee organization, NIS2 compliance.

case5.title: Crypto Exchange Platform (VARA)
case5.description: Global outsourced CISO (Slovakia, UAE, South Asia). Dual role: cybersecurity governance and DPO. VARA and DORA compliance, regulatory audits.

case6.title: European Neobank
case6.description: Autonomous cybersecurity consulting: complete ISMS implementation, DORA and ISO 27001 compliance, PCI DSS management, documentation preparation for external audits.

case7.title: International Payment Institution
case7.description: Risk analysis, security policies, PASSI audit preparation (organizational and configuration), IT team support, DORA and ISO 27001 compliance.

meta.title: Your Cybersecurity Needs | Cyber-SSI
meta.description: Identify your IT security needs: regulatory compliance, security posture assessment, cyber maturity improvement, penetration testing.

intro.text: You haven't yet structured your IT security strategy? You don't know if you comply with the latest regulations applicable to your business? It may be time to call on a cybersecurity company to protect your business, your data, your clients' data, and preserve your revenue:

benefits.trust: Strengthen the trust of your clients and partners

intro.conclusion: Protect today what will still matter tomorrow.

need1.title: Regulatory Compliance
need1.description: Do you want to identify the obligations applicable to your business and be supported in their implementation?

need2.title: Assess Your Security Posture
need2.description: Do you want to evaluate your company against cybersecurity regulations and standards? Identify your gaps and prioritize your compliance actions?

need3.title: Improve Your Company's Cyber Maturity
need3.description: Do you want to structure your cybersecurity approach, strengthen your existing systems and align your practices with market standards?

need4.title: Test Your System's Resistance
need4.description: Do you want to simulate real attacks to assess the resistance of your information system? Our teams perform penetration tests, technical audits and Red Team exercises.

priority.title: Is my IT security a priority?
priority.text1: As an SMB or institution, neglecting your IT security directly endangers your profitability. A cyberattack can paralyze your operations for days, expose sensitive data from your clients and suppliers, and cause major financial losses.
priority.text2: Between business interruptions, loss of trust from your partners and potential sanctions, investing in your cybersecurity is no longer an option, it's a strategic necessity.

cta.title: Ready to secure your business?
cta.description: Contact us for a personalized assessment of your cybersecurity needs.
